com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.map

Class NavigationMapboxMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.ui.v5.map.NavigationMapboxMap

  • public class NavigationMapboxMap
extends Object
    Wrapper class for MapboxMap.

    This class initializes various map-related components and plugins that are useful for providing a navigation-driven map experience.

    These APIs include drawing a route line, camera animations, and more.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NavigationMapboxMap(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapView mapView, com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap mapboxMap)
      Constructor that can be used once OnMapReadyCallback has been called via MapView.getMapAsync(OnMapReadyCallback).

    • Constructor Detail

      • NavigationMapboxMap

        public NavigationMapboxMap(@NonNull
                           com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapView mapView,
                           @NonNull
                           com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap mapboxMap)
        Constructor that can be used once OnMapReadyCallback has been called via MapView.getMapAsync(OnMapReadyCallback).
        Parameters:
        mapView - for map size and Context
        mapboxMap - for APIs to interact with the map

    • Method Detail

      • addMarker

        public void addMarker(Context context,
                      com.mapbox.geojson.Point position)
        Adds a marker icon on the map at the given position.

        The icon used for this method can be defined in your theme with the attribute navigationViewDestinationMarker.

        Parameters:
        context - to retrieve the icon drawable from the theme
        position - the point at which the marker will be placed

      • clearMarkers

        public void clearMarkers()
        Clears all markers on the map that have been added by this class.

        This will not clear all markers from the map entirely. Does nothing if no markers have been added.

      • updateLocation

        public void updateLocation(Location location)
        Updates the location icon on the map and way name data (if found) for the given Location.
        Parameters:
        location - to update the icon and query the map

      • updateLocationLayerRenderMode

        public void updateLocationLayerRenderMode(int renderMode)
        Updates how the user location is shown on the map.

        • RenderMode.NORMAL: Shows user location, bearing ignored
        • RenderMode.COMPASS: Shows user location with bearing considered from compass
        • RenderMode.GPS: Shows user location with bearing considered from location
        Parameters:
        renderMode - GPS, NORMAL, or COMPASS

      • addProgressChangeListener

        public void addProgressChangeListener(MapboxNavigation navigation)
        Can be used to automatically drive the map camera / route updates and arrow once navigation has started.

        These will automatically be removed in MapboxNavigation#onDestroy().

        Parameters:
        navigation - to add the progress listeners

      • saveStateWith

        public void saveStateWith(String key,
                          Bundle outState)
        Can be used to store the current state of the map in Activity.onSaveInstanceState(Bundle, PersistableBundle).

        This method uses NavigationMapboxMapInstanceState, stored with the provided key. This key can also later be used to extract the NavigationMapboxMapInstanceState.

        Parameters:
        key - used to store the state
        outState - to store state variables

      • restoreFrom

        public void restoreFrom(NavigationMapboxMapInstanceState instanceState)
        Can be used to restore a NavigationMapboxMap after it has been initialized.

        This cannot be called in Activity.onRestoreInstanceState(Bundle) because we cannot guarantee the map is re-initialized at that point.

        You can extract the NavigationMapboxMapInstanceState in onRestoreInstanceState and then restore the map once it's ready.

        Parameters:
        instanceState - to extract state variables

      • drawRoute

        public void drawRoute(@NonNull
                      com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsRoute route)
        Will draw the given DirectionsRoute on the map using the colors defined in your given style.
        Parameters:
        route - to be drawn

      • drawRoutes

        public void drawRoutes(@NonNull
                       List<com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsRoute> routes)
        Will draw the given list of DirectionsRoute on the map using the colors defined in your given style.

        The primary route will default to the first route in the directions route list. All other routes in the list will be drawn on the map using the alternative route style.

        Parameters:
        routes - to be drawn

      • setOnRouteSelectionChangeListener

        public void setOnRouteSelectionChangeListener(@NonNull
                                              OnRouteSelectionChangeListener listener)
        Set a OnRouteSelectionChangeListener to know which route the user has currently selected as their primary route.
        Parameters:
        listener - a listener which lets you know when the user has changed the primary route and provides the current direction route which the user has selected

      • showAlternativeRoutes

        public void showAlternativeRoutes(boolean alternativesVisible)
        Toggle whether or not you'd like the map to display the alternative routes. This option can be used for when the user actually begins the navigation session and alternative routes aren't needed anymore.
        Parameters:
        alternativesVisible - true if you'd like alternative routes to be displayed on the map, else false

      • removeRoute

        public void removeRoute()
        Will remove the drawn route displayed on the map. Does nothing if no route is drawn.

      • retrieveCamera

        public NavigationCamera retrieveCamera()
        Provides the camera being used to animate the map camera positions along the route, driven by the progress change listener.
        Returns:
        camera used to animate map

      • updateCameraTrackingMode

        public void updateCameraTrackingMode(int trackingMode)
        Updates the NavigationCamera.TrackingMode that will be used when camera tracking is enabled.
        Parameters:
        trackingMode - the tracking mode
        Since:
        0.21.0

      • startCamera

        public void startCamera(@NonNull
                        com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsRoute directionsRoute)
        Centers the map camera to the beginning of the provided DirectionsRoute.
        Parameters:
        directionsRoute - to update the camera position

      • resumeCamera

        public void resumeCamera(@NonNull
                         Location location)
        Centers the map camera around the provided Location.
        Parameters:
        location - to update the camera position

      • resetCameraPositionWith

        public void resetCameraPositionWith(int trackingCameraMode)
        Resets the map camera / padding to the last known camera position.

        You can also specify a tracking mode to reset with. For example if you would like to reset the camera and continue tracking, you would use NavigationCamera.NAVIGATION_TRACKING_MODE_GPS.

        Parameters:
        trackingCameraMode - the tracking mode

      • resetPadding

        public void resetPadding()
        This method resets the map padding to the default padding that is generated when navigation begins (location icon moved to lower half of the screen) or the custom padding that was last passed via MapPaddingAdjustor.adjustLocationIconWith(int[]).

        The custom padding will be used if it exists, otherwise the default will be used.

      • showRouteOverview

        public void showRouteOverview(int[] padding)
        Adjusts the map camera to DirectionsRoute being traveled along.

        Also includes the given padding.

        Parameters:
        padding - for creating the overview camera position

      • updateWaynameQueryMap

        public void updateWaynameQueryMap(boolean isEnabled)
        Enables or disables the way name chip underneath the location icon.
        Parameters:
        isEnabled - true to enable, false to disable

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        Should be used in FragmentActivity.onStart() to ensure proper accounting for the lifecycle.

      • onStop

        public void onStop()
        Should be used in FragmentActivity.onStop() to ensure proper accounting for the lifecycle.

      • updateLocationVisibilityTo

        public void updateLocationVisibilityTo(boolean isVisible)
        Hide or show the location icon on the map.
        Parameters:
        isVisible - true to show, false to hide

      • retrieveMap

        public com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap retrieveMap()
        Provides the MapboxMap originally given in the constructor.

        This method gives access to all map-related APIs.

        Returns:
        map provided in the constructor

      • updateIncidentsVisibility

        public void updateIncidentsVisibility(boolean isVisible)
        Updates the visibility of incidents layers on the map (if any exist).
        Parameters:
        isVisible - true if incidents should be visible, false otherwise

      • isIncidentsVisible

        public boolean isIncidentsVisible()
        Returns true if the map has incidents layers and they are visible and will return false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the map has incidents layers and they are visible, false otherwise

      • updateTrafficVisibility

        public void updateTrafficVisibility(boolean isVisible)
        Updates the visibility of traffic layers on the map (if any exist).
        Parameters:
        isVisible - true if traffic should be visible, false otherwise

      • isTrafficVisible

        public boolean isTrafficVisible()
        Returns true if the map has traffic layers and they are visible and will return false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the map has traffic layers and they are visible, false otherwise

      • addOnCameraTrackingChangedListener

        public void addOnCameraTrackingChangedListener(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.location.OnCameraTrackingChangedListener listener)
        Add a OnCameraTrackingChangedListener to the LocationComponent that is wrapped within this class.

        This listener will fire any time camera tracking is dismissed or the camera mode is updated.

        Parameters:
        listener - to be added

      • removeOnCameraTrackingChangedListener

        public void removeOnCameraTrackingChangedListener(com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.location.OnCameraTrackingChangedListener listener)
        Remove a OnCameraTrackingChangedListener from the LocationComponent that is wrapped within this class.
        Parameters:
        listener - to be removed

      • addOnWayNameChangedListener

        public boolean addOnWayNameChangedListener(OnWayNameChangedListener listener)
        Add a OnWayNameChangedListener for listening to updates to the way name shown on the map below the location icon.
        Parameters:
        listener - to be added
        Returns:
        true if added, false if listener was not found

      • removeOnWayNameChangedListener

        public boolean removeOnWayNameChangedListener(OnWayNameChangedListener listener)
        Remove a OnWayNameChangedListener for listening to updates to the way name shown on the map below the location icon.
        Parameters:
        listener - to be removed
        Returns:
        true if removed, false if listener was not found

      • adjustLocationIconWith

        public void adjustLocationIconWith(int[] customPadding)
        Use this method to position the location icon on the map.

        For example, to position the icon in the center of the map, you can pass {0, 0, 0, 0} which eliminates the default padding we provide when navigation begins.

        Parameters:
        customPadding - true if should be centered on the map, false to position above the bottom view

      • takeScreenshot

        public void takeScreenshot(NavigationSnapshotReadyCallback navigationSnapshotReadyCallback)
